title: WHATS WITH THE SPAM IN THIS FORUM
body:
UPDATE: Ok no more spam, ty!

Please stop this spam in help and support part of the forums.

replies.body: We're working with the Boards Dev team to resolve this issue. I'm sorry for the inconvenience, and hopefully Riot can roll something out soon.

Riot has been hacked. LOL

P.S
It saids

* scrubbed by Wuks
